response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This exceptional item holds a significant value to us, as it represents years of innovation and expertise. We are offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price tailored to your budget. Our initial offer is set at $1,300,000, aiming to provide a fair balance between our valuation and your perceived worth of the product. We believe this price reflects the quality, functionality, and potential impact of the product on your endeavors. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1300000}
